remarks: The norm of a division in a nonzero normed ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmdvr.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
nmdvr.n $e |- N = ( norm ` R ) $.
nmdvr.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
nmdvr.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
nmdvr $p |- ( ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ R e. NzRing ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. U ) ) -> ( N ` ( A ./ B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) / ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
